test-method.name: TC001_Login_Success_Dashboard_Visible
test-method.description: TC001_Login_Success_Dashboard_Visible: Verify that a registered user can log in with valid credentials and see the Dashboard.

test-method.name: TC002_Login_Success_Validate_Title_and_Dashboard_Elements
test-method.description: TC002_Login_Success_Validate_Title_and_Dashboard_Elements: Verify successful login and validate title and key dashboard elements.

test-method.name: TC003_Login_Failure_Invalid_Credentials
test-method.description: TC003_Login_Failure_Invalid_Credentials: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an appropriate error message is displayed.

test-method.name: loginAndVerifyFirstNameIsNotEmpty
test-method.description: Login to OrangeHRM, navigate to My Info, read First Name, print it, and assert it is not empty

test-method.name: shouldLoginWithValidCredentialsAndSeeDashboard
test-method.description: Verify user can log in with valid credentials and reach the Dashboard
